treatments_requested.name: High-dose Chemotherapy with Stem Cell Transplant

study_details.study_name: Literature support for autologous stem cell transplant
study_details.key_findings: Autologous stem cell transplant is a more encouraging alternative for patients refractory to traditional treatments for autoimmune disease.

rationale: The patient's severe, progressive autoimmune disease has not responded to standard therapies. Literature supports the requested treatment as a viable alternative for refractory cases, with no reasonable alternatives available.
